Not the most powerful drawing tool in the world, but for such a lightweight FOSS tool, it's capabilities are more than sufficient for most business tasks unless you have very special high performance requirements. Drawio is great for drawing UML models, flow charts, org charts, and more. I can also recommend the web / browser version (diagrams.net) if you cannot or do not wish to install the local app.
